annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Importing specific items instead of using wildcard imports improves code readability and maintainability.
label: best_practice
reason: Importing specific items instead of using wildcard imports improves code readability and maintainability.

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Low): Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.
label: sast_risk
reason: Using wildcard imports can lead to namespace collisions and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace.

annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Explicitly extending __all__ with imported module's __all__ to control what is exported.
label: best_practice
reason: Explicitly extending __all__ with imported module's __all__ to control what is exported.
